title: How to write an article in journalism - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion an article in journalism should be made up of 1. A context introduction; 2. The facts; 3. Quotes from the facts’ main actors, including some brief focus on them and how they are involved; 4. Comments from other sources and people; 5. Comments of the journalists. Respecting or adhere as much as possible to this simple overall scheme should preserve the integrity of the journalist and the reader. A journalist must, in my opinion, inform about facts, a good journalist makes it comprehensible to everybody, an excellent journalist makes also himself, his opinions, comprehensible. This is how to make correct and honest information.
